TopicTitle: OSP Mk3 Firebird || Heavy VTOL SSTO, 1500 dV to LKO with a 10t payload

Articles.Content:
Hey people, I whipped up this spaceplane, I think it's actually pretty good. Only mods needed are OPT, B9 procedural wings and MechJeb2, don't try to land it with MechJeb, though. It will go all the way to Minmus without refueling and it's easy to land with vertical thrusters. It has good enough room for a small or medium rover with plenty of science equipment. I'll leave you with some pics and the download link here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)[http://kerbalx.com/nestor_d/OSP-Mk3-Firebird](http://kerbalx.com/nestor_d/OSP-Mk3-Firebird)
